subWordLists.Eng_Sentence: The airline reimbursed me for the amount they had overcharged me.
subWordLists.Ch_Sentence: 航空公司多收了我錢，他們後來退還給我了。

subWordLists.Eng_Sentence: Organizational ability is an essential attribute for a good manager.
subWordLists.Ch_Sentence: 組織能力是一個出色經理必備的素質。

subWordLists.Ch_Word: [ɪkˈsiːd]超過，超出（數量）；超越（規定的範圍）
subWordLists.Eng_Sentence: The final cost should not exceed $5000.
subWordLists.Ch_Sentence: 最終的費用不應超出5000美元。

subWordLists.Eng_Sentence: She's got a very distinctive voice.
subWordLists.Ch_Sentence: 她的嗓音很獨特。

subWordLists.Eng_Sentence: I like the the layout of the house.
subWordLists.Ch_Sentence: 我喜歡這座房子的佈局。

subWordLists.Eng_Sentence: scientific terminology
subWordLists.Ch_Sentence: 科學術語

subWordLists.Eng_Sentence: Can you duplicate (= use a special machine to copy) this document for me?
subWordLists.Ch_Sentence: 你能爲我複印一下這份文件嗎?

subWordLists.Eng_Sentence: If you want excitement, you should try parachuting.
subWordLists.Ch_Sentence: 如果你想尋求刺激，應該去試一下跳傘。

subWordLists.Ch_Word: 條件；情況；情形；形勢；境況
subWordLists.Eng_Sentence: I think she coped very well under the circumstances.
subWordLists.Ch_Sentence: 我覺得在那種情況下她處理得很不錯。

subWordLists.Ch_Word: [kɒn.səˈleɪ.ʃən]安慰；慰藉；給人帶來安慰的事物
subWordLists.Eng_Sentence: I didn't know what to say - I just offered a few words of consolation.
subWordLists.Ch_Sentence: 我不知說甚麽好——只是安慰了幾句。

subWordLists.Eng_Sentence: The research project is based on the premise stated earlier.
subWordLists.Ch_Sentence: 這項研究計劃是基於早先提出的假設之上的。

subWordLists.Eng_Sentence: She was reprimanded by her teacher for biting another girl.
subWordLists.Ch_Sentence: 她因為咬了另一個女孩而受到了老師的訓斥。

subWordLists.Eng_Sentence: You can eat whatever you like as long as it's in moderation.
subWordLists.Ch_Sentence: 你想吃甚麼都可以，只要適量就好。

subWordLists.Ch_Word: [ɪˈments]極大的，非常好的，巨大的，無限的
subWordLists.Eng_Sentence: They spent an immense amount of time getting the engine into perfect condition.
subWordLists.Ch_Sentence: 他們花了大量時間使引擎運轉完美。

subWordLists.Ch_Word: [daɪˈnæm.ɪk]動力，思維活躍的；活潑的，充滿活力的，精力充沛的
subWordLists.Eng_Sentence: She's young and dynamic and will be a great addition to the team.
subWordLists.Ch_Sentence: 她年輕活潑，會給團隊增添不少活力。

subWordLists.Eng_Sentence: If she doesn't want to go, nothing you can say will persuade her.
subWordLists.Ch_Sentence: 如果她不想去，你是說甚麼也勸不動她的。

subWordLists.Eng_Sentence: He managed to convince the jury of his innocence.
subWordLists.Ch_Sentence: 他使陪審團相信他是無辜的。

subWordLists.Eng_Sentence: Any further correspondence should be sent to my new address.
subWordLists.Ch_Sentence: 以後來信請寄到我的新地址。

subWordLists.Ch_Word: [ˈæb.sə.luːt]完全的；全部的；絕對的；毋庸置疑的
subWordLists.Eng_Sentence: I have absolute faith in her judgment.
subWordLists.Ch_Sentence: 我完全相信她的判斷。

subWordLists.Eng_Sentence: The tour operator will arrange transport and plan your itinerary.
subWordLists.Ch_Sentence: 旅行社工作人員將負責安排交通和行程計劃。

subWordLists.Eng_Sentence: The reviews of his latest film have been highly complimentary.
subWordLists.Ch_Sentence: 評論文章對他的最新影片高度讚賞。

subWordLists.Eng_Sentence: the rate of inflation
subWordLists.Ch_Sentence: 通貨膨脹率

subWordLists.Eng_Sentence: Thompson has been designated (as/to be) team captain.
subWordLists.Ch_Sentence: 湯姆森被指定擔任隊長。

subWordLists.Eng_Sentence: The machines have to be made of durable materials.
subWordLists.Ch_Sentence: 這種機器必須使用耐用的材料來製造。

subWordLists.Ch_Word: [ˈkɔː.ʃəs]（人）謹慎的，細心的，小心翼翼的
subWordLists.Eng_Sentence: The old lady is very cautious with money.
subWordLists.Ch_Sentence: 那位老太太用錢很謹慎。

subWordLists.Eng_Sentence: They did a thorough search of the area but found nothing.
subWordLists.Ch_Sentence: 他們仔細搜索了該地區，但一無所獲。

subWordLists.Ch_Word: [əˈsjuːm]假定，假設；臆斷，想當然地認為
subWordLists.Eng_Sentence: Let's assume (that) they're coming and make plans on that basis.
subWordLists.Ch_Sentence: 我們還是假定他們會來，並以此來作出計劃。

subWordLists.Eng_Sentence: The newspaper gave an editorial appraisal of the government's achievements of the past year.
subWordLists.Ch_Sentence: 這家報紙發表社論，對政府在過去一年的功績作出評價。

subWordLists.Ch_Word: [suːˈpɪə.ri.ər]較好的，好於平均的，好過其他的，優越的
subWordLists.Eng_Sentence: This is clearly the work of a superior artist.
subWordLists.Ch_Sentence: 這顯然是一位優秀藝術家的作品。

subWordLists.Eng_Sentence: The track broadens and becomes a road at this point.
subWordLists.Ch_Sentence: 小道逐漸拓寬，到這裡就成了一條馬路。

subWordLists.Eng_Sentence: He's a bright enough student - he just lacks motivation.
subWordLists.Ch_Sentence: 他是個很聰明的學生，只是不夠積極。

subWordLists.Eng_Sentence: You must acknowledge the truth of her argument.
subWordLists.Ch_Sentence: 你必須承認，她的論點是事實。

subWordLists.Eng_Sentence: a government spokesperson
subWordLists.Ch_Sentence: 政府發言人

subWordLists.Eng_Sentence: She is one of the recipients of prizes.
subWordLists.Ch_Sentence: 她是獲獎者之一。

subWordLists.Eng_Sentence: We will incorporate your suggestion in this new plan.
subWordLists.Ch_Sentence: 我們將把你的建議納入這一新的計畫。
